articles.title: Owner of burnt Toa Payoh flat fears for future, says his three children now have 'nothing'
articles.content: â€œI looked up and saw my house burning. I told myself, â€˜itâ€™s goneâ€™,â€ the 55-year-old told CNA. The fire from Mr Tanâ€™s home on the 10th floor later spread to the unit above. The fires were extinguished at about 3.30pm, said a Singapore Civil Defence Force (SCDF) spokesperson. Seven people were taken to the hospital on Tuesday afternoon, including a child and a firefighter. His wife, 41, and maid were among those who were taken to the Singapore General Hospital.

articles.title: A Marine veteranâ€™s wife, detained by ICE while still breastfeeding, has been released
articles.content: A Marine Corps veteranâ€™s wife has been released from US Immigration and Customs Enforcement detention following advocacy from Sen. John Kennedy, a Louisiana Republican who backs President Donald Trumpâ€™s hardline immigration crackdown. Kennedyâ€™s constituent services representative, Christy Tate, congratulated Adrian Clouatre on his wifeâ€™s release and thanked him for his...

articles.title: DJ Koo still goes to see Barbie Hsu every day
articles.content: "I immediately thought, could that be DJ Koo. As we got closer, it really was. He politely said thank you to us," the netizen said. He is really the most affectionate man I have ever seen. I hope he can get over the pain."
